actionRequired.title: Action Required: Authorize Recurring Payment
actionRequired.message: To keep your NameTAG number active, please authorize recurring payments via telebirr.
actionRequired.pinPrompt: You will receive a PIN prompt via push notification.
actionRequired.suspensionWarning: If not authorized, your NameTAG number will be suspended 30 days after the recurring fee due date.

tagInfo.resubscribeMessage: You can Resubscribe this TAG Number within 7 days from unsubscription date.

accountStatus.blocked: Your NameTAG account has been blocked. Please contact NameTAG Support for further assistance.

registrationInfo.registeredCount: You have registered {{total}} out of a maximum of {{max}} NameTAGs.

documentStatus.underReview: Your document is currently under review. Please wait patiently.
documentStatus.reviewTime: The review process may take up to 48 hours. You will receive an SMS notification once your document has been reviewed.
documentStatus.rejected: Your documents have been rejected. Please check the details and resubmit them

emptyStates.canReserveWhileProcessing: In the meantime, you can reserve NameTAG numbers while your document is being processed.
emptyStates.noTagReserved: No NameTAG number has been reserved or subscribed yet.

toastMessages.errorProcessing: Sorry, we're unable to process your request right now. Please try again later.
toastMessages.mandateSent: Your request to initiate the telebirr mandate has been sent. Please check your mobile device and approve it using your telebirr PIN.

messages.resubscribe: Are you sure you want to resubscribe to this NameTAG service?
messages.cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your NameTAG reservation?
messages.close: Are you sure you want to approve the NameTAG account closure request?
messages.default: Are you sure you want to proceed with this action?

descriptions.unsubscribeIndividual: All fees paid are non-refundable.This NameTAG will be permanently removed and cannot be reclaimed.

warnings.unsubscribe: Note: You can resubscribe anytime within the next 7 days. After that this NameTAG will be available for others to buy.
warnings.cancel: If you proceed, your reservation will be cancelled, and this NameTAG will be released for others to buy.

placeholders.closeAccountReason: Enter reason for closing your account
